title: Java
description: Learn Java programming from scratch and build real-world applications.

pathway.title: Introduction to Java
pathway.details: Learn the basics of Java programming, syntax, data types, and simple applications.

pathway.title: Control Flow and Loops
pathway.details: Understand conditional statements, loops, and exception handling in Java.

pathway.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
pathway.details: Learn OOP principles like encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction.

pathway.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
pathway.details: Understand linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and sorting/searching algorithms using Java.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: Java Collections Framework
pathway.details: Explore ArrayList, HashMap, HashSet, and other built-in Java collection classes.

pathway.title: Multithreading and Concurrency
pathway.details: Learn how to implement multi-threading, synchronization, and concurrent programming.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: File Handling and I/O Streams
pathway.details: Understand file handling, serialization, and input/output stream operations in Java.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: Database Connectivity with JDBC
pathway.details: Connect Java applications to databases using JDBC and perform CRUD operations.

pathway.title: Java for Web Development
pathway.details: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using JSP, Servlets, and Java frameworks.

pathway.title: Spring Boot and RESTful APIs
pathway.details: Develop microservices using Spring Boot and build RESTful APIs.

pathway.title: Microservices Architecture
pathway.details: Understand the fundamentals of microservices, API gateway, and cloud deployments.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Apply your Java knowledge in real-world projects, including web applications and API development.

title: Python
description: Master Python programming and its applications in data science, AI, and automation.

pathway.title: Python Fundamentals
pathway.details: Cover basic Python syntax, loops, and functions.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: Data Science with Python
pathway.details: Learn NumPy, Pandas, and data visualization techniques.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: AI & Machine Learning
pathway.details: Explore AI concepts and build ML models using Python.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

pathway.title: Final Project
pathway.details: Implement a real-world Python-based project.

data.content: Java is a versatile programming language used in various applications.

title: R Language
description: Learn R programming for statistical computing and data visualization.

pathway.title: Introduction to R
pathway.details: Learn the basics of R programming, including syntax, variables, and data types.

pathway.title: Data Wrangling with R
pathway.details: Explore data manipulation techniques using dplyr and tidyr.

pathway.title: Statistical Analysis with R
pathway.details: Perform statistical tests, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis.

pathway.title: Data Visualization
pathway.details: Create insightful visualizations using ggplot2 and base R plotting functions.

pathway.title: Machine Learning with R
pathway.details: Build predictive models using popular machine learning packages like caret.

pathway.title: Time Series Analysis
pathway.details: Analyze time-series data and forecasting models using R.

pathway.title: Web Scraping with R
pathway.details: Extract and process data from websites using rvest.

pathway.title: R for Big Data
pathway.details: Work with large datasets using data.table and SparkR.

pathway.title: Shiny Web Applications
pathway.details: Build interactive web apps using Shiny in R.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Apply R skills in real-world projects related to data analysis and visualization.

title: SQL
description: Master SQL for database management and data analytics.

pathway.title: SQL Fundamentals
pathway.details: Learn basic SQL queries, data types, and database operations.

pathway.title: Working with Tables and Joins
pathway.details: Understand how to create, modify, and join tables using SQL.

pathway.title: Aggregate Functions and Subqueries
pathway.details: Use aggregate functions and nested queries to extract insights from data.

pathway.title: Advanced SQL Queries
pathway.details: Write complex queries using window functions, CTEs, and recursive queries.

pathway.title: Database Optimization
pathway.details: Implement indexing, normalization, and performance tuning techniques.

pathway.title: Stored Procedures and Triggers
pathway.details: Learn how to automate database tasks using stored procedures and triggers.

pathway.title: Data Warehousing and ETL
pathway.details: Understand data warehousing concepts and implement ETL processes.

pathway.title: Real-world Applications
pathway.details: Work on practical database projects, including data analytics and reporting.

title: React
description: Learn React for building dynamic and modern web applications.

pathway.title: React Fundamentals
pathway.details: Learn the basics of React, JSX, components, and virtual DOM.

pathway.title: State & Props
pathway.details: Understand how state and props work in React and how to manage component data.

pathway.title: Component Lifecycle & Hooks
pathway.details: Explore component lifecycle methods and React Hooks for functional components.

pathway.title: Event Handling in React
pathway.details: Learn how to handle user interactions with event listeners in React.

pathway.title: React Router & Navigation
pathway.details: Implement navigation using React Router and create multi-page applications.

pathway.title: React with APIs
pathway.details: Learn how to fetch and manage data from external APIs using Axios and Fetch API.

pathway.title: State Management with Context API & Redux
pathway.details: Explore advanced state management techniques using Context API and Redux.

pathway.title: Performance Optimization
pathway.details: Optimize React applications using memoization, lazy loading, and code splitting.

pathway.title: Testing in React
pathway.details: Learn how to write unit and integration tests using Jest and React Testing Library.

pathway.title: Building a Full-stack App
pathway.details: Combine React with a backend (Node.js, Firebase, or Django) to build a full-stack application.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Apply your React knowledge by building real-world projects.

title: Android
description: Develop Android applications using Java and Kotlin.

pathway.title: Android Studio Setup
pathway.details: Set up Android Studio, understand project structure, and run a simple app.

pathway.title: UI/UX Components
pathway.details: Learn about layouts, views, RecyclerView, and Material Design principles.

pathway.title: Activity & Fragment Lifecycle
pathway.details: Understand the lifecycle of activities and fragments in Android applications.

pathway.title: Working with Intents & Navigation
pathway.details: Implement explicit and implicit intents for seamless app navigation.

pathway.title: Database & APIs
pathway.details: Connect apps to local (SQLite, Room) and remote (Firebase, REST APIs) databases.

pathway.title: Kotlin for Android
pathway.details: Learn the essentials of Kotlin for modern Android development.

pathway.title: Background Tasks & Notifications
pathway.details: Handle background processing using WorkManager, services, and notifications.

pathway.title: Testing & Debugging
pathway.details: Implement unit and UI testing using JUnit and Espresso.

pathway.title: App Deployment & Play Store Publishing
pathway.details: Prepare apps for release and publish them on Google Play Store.

pathway.title: Final App Project
pathway.details: Apply all learned concepts to build and deploy a complete Android application.

title: Machine Learning
description: Explore machine learning techniques and implement models in Python.

pathway.title: ML Basics
pathway.details: Understand the fundamentals of machine learning, types, and real-world applications.

pathway.title: Data Preprocessing & Feature Engineering
pathway.details: Learn how to clean, preprocess, and engineer features for better model performance.

pathway.title: Supervised Learning Algorithms
pathway.details: Explore regression and classification algorithms like Linear Regression and Decision Trees.

pathway.title: Unsupervised Learning Techniques
pathway.details: Learn about clustering and dimensionality reduction techniques like K-Means and PCA.

pathway.title: Neural Networks & Deep Learning
pathway.details: Understand the basics of neural networks, activation functions, and backpropagation.

pathway.title: Model Training & Evaluation
pathway.details: Train machine learning models and evaluate their performance using metrics like accuracy and F1-score.

pathway.title: Hyperparameter Tuning & Optimization
pathway.details: Learn how to improve model performance using Grid Search and Random Search.

pathway.title: ML Deployment & Model Serving
pathway.details: Deploy trained models using Flask, FastAPI, or cloud-based services.

pathway.title: ML Project
pathway.details: Apply all the learned concepts to build and evaluate a real-world machine learning project.

title: Ethical Hacking
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques to secure networks and applications.

pathway.title: Introduction to Ethical Hacking
pathway.details: Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity, ethical hacking principles, and legal aspects.

pathway.title: Network Security Basics
pathway.details: Learn about firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and network defense strategies.

pathway.title: Web Application Security
pathway.details: Explore OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and secure web applications from attacks.

pathway.title: Advanced Penetration Testing
pathway.details: Perform advanced penetration testing techniques on different systems and networks.

pathway.title: Cryptography & Secure Communication
pathway.details: Learn encryption techniques, secure protocols, and cryptographic algorithms.

pathway.title: Wireless Network Security
pathway.details: Secure Wi-Fi networks against attacks like packet sniffing and rogue access points.

pathway.title: Malware Analysis & Reverse Engineering
pathway.details: Analyze malware behavior and reverse-engineer malicious code.

pathway.title: Final Security Audit
pathway.details: Conduct a full-scale security assessment and present a detailed audit report.

title: Generative AI Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of Generative AI and its applications in real-world scenarios.

pathway.title: AI Basics
pathway.details: Introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning concepts.

pathway.title: Deep Learning Concepts
pathway.details: Learn about neural networks, backpropagation, and optimization techniques.

pathway.title: Transformer Models & LLMs
pathway.details: Understand Transformer-based architectures like GPT and BERT.

pathway.title: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)
pathway.details: Explore how GANs generate new data using adversarial training.

pathway.title: Variational Autoencoders (VAEs)
pathway.details: Learn how VAEs generate new content by encoding and decoding data distributions.

pathway.title: Ethics & Bias in AI
pathway.details: Study the ethical considerations and biases in generative AI applications.

pathway.title: AI Model Deployment
pathway.details: Deploy generative AI models using cloud platforms and APIs.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Apply all learned concepts to build and deploy a generative AI-based project.

title: Cybersecurity for Everyone
description: Gain knowledge on cybersecurity fundamentals and risk mitigation strategies.

pathway.title: Cybersecurity Basics
pathway.details: Introduction to information security, cyber threats, and security principles.

pathway.title: Network Security
pathway.details: Understanding firewalls, VPNs, and intrusion detection systems.

pathway.title: Threat Analysis
pathway.details: Identifying and mitigating potential cyber threats and vulnerabilities.

pathway.title: Real-world Cybersecurity Challenges
pathway.details: Applying security measures in real-world scenarios through case studies.

title: UI/UX
description: Learn UI/UX design principles to create user-friendly applications.

pathway.title: Introduction to UI/UX
pathway.details: Understanding the fundamentals of user experience and interface design.

pathway.title: Wireframing & Prototyping
pathway.details: Creating wireframes and interactive prototypes using tools like Figma and Adobe XD.

pathway.title: Advanced Design Techniques
pathway.details: Exploring typography, color theory, and accessibility in UI design.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Developing a complete UI/UX project with usability testing and feedback analysis.

title: DevOps
description: Master DevOps practices for efficient software development and deployment.

pathway.title: Introduction to DevOps
pathway.details: Understanding the DevOps culture, benefits, and collaboration techniques.

pathway.title: CI/CD Pipelines
pathway.details: Implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment workflows.

pathway.title: Cloud Infrastructure
pathway.details: Managing cloud-based deployments with AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Building a DevOps pipeline integrating CI/CD, monitoring, and security best practices.

title: Financial Marketing
description: Understand financial marketing strategies and analytics.

pathway.title: Introduction to Financial Marketing
pathway.details: Exploring marketing strategies specific to financial products and services.

pathway.title: Market Research
pathway.details: Understanding customer segmentation, financial branding, and market trends.

pathway.title: Advanced Analytics
pathway.details: Using data analytics and AI for financial market predictions.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Developing a financial marketing campaign and analyzing its performance.

title: Front End Development
description: Learn to build responsive and interactive web applications.

pathway.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
pathway.details: Mastering the basics of web structure and styling with modern CSS techniques.

pathway.title: JavaScript Essentials
pathway.details: Learning core JavaScript concepts, ES6+, and asynchronous programming.

pathway.title: Modern Front-End Frameworks
pathway.details: Exploring React, Vue, and other frameworks for interactive UIs.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Building a full-fledged front-end application with responsive UI.

title: Human Resource Management
description: Master HR strategies for effective people management.

pathway.title: Introduction to HR
pathway.details: Understanding HR fundamentals and organizational structures.

pathway.title: Talent Acquisition
pathway.details: Mastering recruitment strategies, hiring processes, and employer branding.

pathway.title: Performance Management
pathway.details: Implementing employee evaluation and career development plans.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Developing HR policies and strategies for an organization.
